attributes.action: increase the minimum wage each year by the same percentage as the average executive salary at the FTSE top 100 firms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: According to an article on the BBC, boardroom pay has more than doubled since 2000.  Yet at the same time, these "Fat Cat" executives begrudge giving their staff or public employees little more than inflation-matching pay rises.  Increasing the minimum wage at the same rate as top executive's pay will encourage restraint in the boardroom and help close the increasing gap between rich and poor.
